messages.title: A STRONG LEADERSHIP, A CLEAR ECONOMIC PLAN, A BRIGHTER, MORE SECURE FUTURE

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal for local homes
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Keeping up the pressure to build more homes locally for future generations which are affordable.
Protecting and enhancing local services like schools and GP services, ensuring communities get their fair share.
Investing in better rail services and fighting for Oyster-style ticketing.

housing.content: Keeping up the pressure to build more homes locally for future generations which are affordable.

leaflet.personalStatement: Mark speaks up for everyone, regardless of how you vote.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fighting for more local health & school services, investing in our roads and railways.

contactInformation.address: West Wing, 2nd Floor, London House, Bishop's Stortford, Hertfordshire, CM23 3LU.

endorsements.endorsement: He's a strong voice for Hertford & Stortford. I need him to help me secure our country's future.

quotes.text: He's a strong voice for Hertford & Stortford. I need him to help me secure our country's future.
